newsletter.title: Newsletter
newsletter.description: Stay updated with the latest news from Stichting Boerengroep and our partner organizations.

signup.title: Subscribe to Our Newsletter
signup.description: Stay updated with our latest news, events, and sustainable agriculture initiatives.
signup.consent_newsletter: I want to receive newsletters from Stichting Boerengroep
signup.consent_processing: I consent to the processing of my personal data according to the privacy policy
signup.gdpr_notice: Your privacy matters to us. We only use your data to send you our newsletter and comply with GDPR regulations.
signup.success_message: Thank you for subscribing! Please check your email to verify your subscription.
signup.error_message: Something went wrong. Please try again.

verify.title: Verify Your Email
verify.description: Please verify your email address to complete your newsletter subscription.
verify.no_token: No verification token provided. Please check the link in your email.
verify.error_message: Failed to verify email. Please try again or contact support.

unsubscribe.title: Unsubscribe from Newsletter
unsubscribe.description: We're sorry to see you go. Please let us know why you're unsubscribing.
unsubscribe.no_token: No unsubscribe token provided. Please use the link from your email.
unsubscribe.reason_placeholder: e.g., Too many emails, Not relevant, etc.
unsubscribe.feedback_placeholder: Help us improve by sharing your thoughts...
unsubscribe.success_message: Thank you for being part of our community. You can always re-subscribe later if you change your mind.
unsubscribe.error_message: Failed to unsubscribe. Please try again or contact support.

exportData.title: Export Your Data
exportData.description: Request a copy of all personal data we have stored about you.
exportData.what_included: What's included in your data export:
exportData.gdpr_notice: This data export is provided in compliance with GDPR Article 15 (Right of Access).
exportData.delivery_notice: Your data export will be sent to your email address within 24 hours.
exportData.error_message: Failed to request data export. Please try again or contact support.

deleteData.title: Delete Your Data
deleteData.description: Permanently delete all your personal data from our systems.
deleteData.warning_message: ⚠️ This action cannot be undone. All your data will be permanently deleted.
deleteData.deleted_subscription: Your subscription and all related preferences
deleteData.deleted_communications: Records of all communications sent to you
deleteData.reason_placeholder: Help us understand why you're deleting your data...
deleteData.confirmation_text: I understand this action cannot be undone and want to permanently delete all my data
deleteData.gdpr_notice: This data deletion is provided in compliance with GDPR Article 17 (Right to Erasure).
deleteData.error_message: Failed to delete data. Please try again or contact support.

calendar.title: Event Calendar
calendar.description: View all upcoming events, workshops, meetings, and activities.

events.noEvents: No events found for this month.

errors.noEventsAdmin: No events found. Add events through the TinaCMS admin panel.
